title: Credentialing at UPMC
description: Practitioners wishing to provide services at the UPMC facilities must be credentialed by each facility where services will be provided. Learn more.

Credentialing at UPMC
UPMC Content 3
This site is designed to provide information to health care professionals — physicians, nurses, and allied health professionals — regarding the credentialing process for hospital privileges at UPMC.
Practitioners wishing to provide services at the UPMC facilities must be credentialed by each facility where services will be provided.
The
UPMC Credentials Verification Office (CVO)
processes the applications and obtains the primary source verification on behalf of the facilities.
Privileges
View the privileges available at UPMC facilities for:
Physicians
Allied Health Professionals
